items.title: Master degree in Engineering and Embedded Systems
items.description: Here are the major topics I learned and worked on: Machine Learning, Automation, Electronics sensors, IoT, Computer Network and security, Embedded Systems programming using the following languages: C/C++ , Matlab/Simulink and Python.

items.title: Bachelor degree in Robotics and Smart Systems
items.description: During this year, I learned about Computer network suchs GSM, BLE, 4G, and WIFI; Electronic design and micro-electronics, Embedded signal processing and programming.

items.title: Bachelor degree in industrial robotics
items.description: Three years of learning where I learned how to automate the factory chain of company using Electronics, sensors, captors and more.
